comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: January 12, 1914 -- a banquet to kick off the "Centenary of Peace" Anglo-American Exhibition, in London, England. Celebrating a century of amity between the U. S. and Britain, and the U. S. and Canada. {It may be of interest to note the total and entire absence of ladies on this occasion.} Letter from the exhibition's American organizers in the New York Times, November 25, 1913: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9D00EED71E3BE6... Another Bain/LOC photo connected with the Anglo-American Exhibition: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4799378796/in/photostream/]
